alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 23 at 3:40PM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Jackson County through 445 PM EDT... At 340 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles west of Cement City, or 11 miles south of Jackson, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jackson... Brooklyn... Grass Lake... Vandercook Lake... Leoni... Spring Arbor... Napoleon... Norvell... Horton... Hanover... Oak Point... Sunset Beach... Michigan Center... Munith... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
